Title: Tarnished Sword Tomb
Text:
(The inscription shows signs of being deliberately defaced.)

"Damn it… I told you we never should've let the young face the Blightcloud. And now, just us. A bunch of useless ████ left standing. How the hell are we supposed to stop the Kerasaurs?"

"Doesn't matter. If they weren't shorthanded, we'd still be rotting in our ██."

"We've lived our lives. No regrets if we fall here. But those children… they are Septimont's future. They deserve the chance to grow up."

"Save the speeches. What do we actually do? Try to get them out? With ██ closing in, there's nowhere safer than here."

"Then we deal with this the way ████ do. Been a long time since we held weapons. You haven't forgotten how to fight, huh?"

"Heh. Don't go underestimating me! Once I'm done skewering the Kerasaurs, I'll give you a taste of my lance!"

"Your lance? You can't even talk without wheezing, you old bastard!"

"Tch… shut up. So long as I can breathe, I can fight. And while I can fight, those things haven't won yet."

"Damn right. If we're going down… Maybe next time they talk about us, they'll call us something other than ████..."
